thread.title: Ellie Goulding shares the spotlight at the BRIT Awards 2017 with her rarely-seen sister Jordan
thread.title_full: Ellie Goulding shares the spotlight at the BRIT Awards 2017 with her rarely-seen sister Jordan

author: glittlejohn
title: Ellie Goulding shares the spotlight at the BRIT Awards 2017 with her rarely-seen sister Jordan
text:
Ellie Goulding shares the spotlight at the BRIT Awards 2017 with her rarely-seen sister Jordan 
The pop star shared the spotlight with her sibling on the red carpet BY GEORGINA LITTLEJOHN Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments ELLIE Goulding made it family affair at the BRITS 2017 as she took sister Jordan along as her date. 
The pop star shared the spotlight with her sibling as they both posed for the cameras as they made their way up the red carpet. 
And despite being related, the pair couldn’t have looked more different as they had their picture together before making their way into London’s O2 Arena. Rex Features 6 Ellie Goulding arrived at the BRITS 2017 with sister Jordan 
Ellie, 30, looked every inch the glamorous rock chick in her long black dress, which had a thigh-high split at the front, showing off her lean long legs. 
It was embellished with silver chains that ran across her cleavage and her back, her long blonde hair loose down her back. Rex Features The sisters shared a giggle as they stopped on the red carpet PA:Press Association 6 The girls got into position as they stopped for the cameras 
Jordan, 28, also wore a long black dress but hers was without decoration, a simple choker around her neck completing the look. 
She too wore her long hair loose and she looked over the moon and proud as punch to be at her sister’s side. 
No doubt Jordan will be giving her full support to her older sibling who this year is nominated for Best British Female Solo Artist. Getty Images Ellie looked every inch the rock chick for the industry’s biggest night for the year PA:Press Association 6 She even flashed a bit of leg as she made her way inside the venue 
Ellie and Jordan were followed by girl group Little Mix, who are performing during tonight’s’ ceremony and are this year nominated for three awards – Best Single for Shout Out to My Ex, Best British Group and Best Video for Hair. PA:Press Association Triple nominees Little Mix glammed it up for the red carpet
